sentence.text: Mutations in cellular response to DNA damage stimulus cause premature ageing and liver cancer in humans and apoptotic process; thus, defective DPC repair has adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway clinical ramifications.

sentence.text: Finally, we will discuss the negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II of faulty DPC repair on disease and cancer therapy
